thread.section_title: Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bulbs.com | www.bulbs.com | 2 of 90
thread.title: Becky

author: Becky
title: Becky
text:
When I first contacted Bulbs.com they were close to being my last hope in finding some specific fixtures for a project. I was lucky enough to be partnered with Greg, who went above and beyond the call. Not only did he do further research to make sure everything would work together properly, but he also found out how to make it all work together properly and relayed the information so we could be confident in our purchase.
Due to his stellar performance, winning charm, and willingness to help you have won a new customer. Bulbs.com and Greg are my new "go-to" guys.
